results.headline: Wings of Eagles, The
results.summary_short: John Ford's typical study of Flight Commander Frank Wead. Boisterous first half is best.

results.headline: Top Secret Affair
results.summary_short: Part inside-Washington satire, part love's tug-of-war. Back and forth. But lively, often bright.

results.headline: Edge of the City
results.summary_short: Racially focused, less forceful ''On the Waterfront.'' But worthy.

results.summary_short: Not-bad intrigue but skittish treatment. Some okay local color.

results.headline: Barretts of Wimpole Street, The

results.headline: Four Girls in Town
results.summary_short: Sensible, clear-eyed tale of Hollywood hopefuls, for a change. Notable Alex North score.

results.summary_short: Oil-rich family's romantic quadrangle. Handsome production. Malone won supporting Oscar.

results.summary_short: Rival seduces cotton dealer's child bride, via Tennessee Williams. Steamy then, mild now, never profound.
